channel.title: About Me on Shuo Yan

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! My name is Shuo Yan. I am a student in University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign with a double major of psychology and statistics. My interest lies in clinical psychology. My career goal is to be a psychiatrist or a conselor. I also have strong passions in math and statistics. I am currently a research assistent in BEAST Lab which focuses on how emotion affects reasoning.
